column1: The Purple Pig////The most delish pork shoulder I've ever had. The vegetables were amazing. I had the grilled broccoli and tried my date's cauliflower. Sat at the bar and the bartender was very attentive and helpful with wine choice. Be prepared to experience a little aggressiveness when trying to grab a seat at the bar with the rest of us vultures trying to get in on the action. Lively vibe here combined with amazing food
column3: and some well selected beers on tap gives this place a 5 star rating for sure.
